Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class I bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: An internal amide bond between the NH2 of C1 and the gamma-COOH of D9 was observed, as well as two disulfide bridges, one between C1 and C13 and one between C7 and C19. In contrast. Class 2 lassos do not have disulfide bonds.
Sequence Information.Caution: The isopeptide linked residue 9 is shown as Asn rather than Asp as mentioned in PubMed

Literature.Title: Isolation of RP 71955, a new anti-HIV-1 peptide secondary metabolite.
Literature.Author: Helynck G, Dubertret C, Mayaux JF, Leboul J.
